name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Legi-Share: Contact the House and Senate

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Share links, stories, and thoughts with Congress in just a few clicks

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Share your thoughts and ideas with Congress. Email, call, or tweet your Congressperson on the fly!

Legi-Share gives you instant access to your Representatives and Senators in Washington, D.C. Ever read an article and wish you could call, email or tweet at your Congressperson quickly and easily? Tired of having to leave the tab to dig around the internet to figure how who represents you and how to contact them? Well, now you can do it from Chrome with Legi-share. Just a few clicks and your message is sent.

Here are all the great features you get with Legishare:

  -  Constantly updated database of legislator contact information.
  -  Email your Congressperson through their online web contact forms.
  -  Call with your native phone app or using your cell phone or landline.
  -  Write a letter using the D.C. address listed.
  -  Tweet an article or link at your Congressperson! The Twitter link has your Congress members' Twitter handle built in and links to any article you are reading.
  -  Follow your representatives on Facebook.
  -  Watch your Senators on YouTube.
  -  Easily change your settings if you move or your Congressperson changes.
  -  Contacts for the President, VP, Speaker of the House, and Senate Majority Leader included as well!

Set up your state and Representative in the options page beforehand get instant access to contact information in the popup window. Please suggest any corrections or improvements to the developer. Thank you!

PRIVACY NOTE: This extension needs access to your browser tabs in order to share links. At no time does it transmit any personal data or information to the developer. 

ADVERTISING NOTE: This free version does not insert advertising into your browser. The only advertising in the extension is a small link at the bottom of the extension popup window that links to our affiliate pages. Please consider purchasing through the links provided. Your contributions will help keep this extension running!
